name: Kimberly Dent

text: I know they just reopened and I'm not sure if that's why things were so awful. Food was amazing though. There was only 2 small tables for seating along with a few scattered chairs. Employees seemed to have a lack of communication or something.

text: Staff seem nice, waitress was excellent and friendly too. Never too crowded it seems. Pretty nice dining experience plus really good pizza etc.

text: The food was excellent. The service? Totally different story....  I literally had to get up and walk to the counter to ask for a refill and the sauce for the bread sticks was ice cold... Pick up or delivery might be a better option for people at this location

text: This place was one of our favorite places to go sometimes. But now they turned it into a "only carry out and delivery place". They were supposed to improve, yet they got Worse, And the workers attitudes were really displeasing

name: Tiffany Pritts
text: I love Pizza Hut pizza. The crust is nice and greasy which makes it soooo yummy. The only bad thing was when we asked for delivery, they didn't have a driver on duty so we had to pick it up. Not that big of a deal.

text: Unorganized operation. Place was empty but many tables were not cleaned and had crumbs and used napkins left behind.. A few non employee or off schedule employees just hanging out in the food prep area. Decor is original dated from the …More

text: Constantly forget to include dipping sauce, when if you pay extra for it. They add water to their Buffalo sauce. Barely anything on the wings. Just poor store all around. Will contact their corporate to report the issues. See if they are better than the store is.

text: Has been there since I was a teen and still going strong and as good as ever. Also lots of great deals and coupons and the food as good as ever.

text: Despite the majority of reviews, my experiences here have all been good. The staff is very friendly and the wait times they give me are always accurate. Prices are a bit high (as they are at most Pizza Huts) but they always run specials contingent on what day of the week it is.
